#summary How to build ftk from svn source code?
#labels Phase-Deploy,build

= Introduction =

How to build ftk from svn source code?

= Details =

<b>download:</b>
<pre>
svn checkout http://ftk.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ ftk-read-only
</pre>
<b>configure:</b>
<pre>
cd ftk-read-only
./autogen.sh
./configure --with-backend=linux-x11:320x480
</pre>
<b>build:</b>
<pre>
make && make install
</pre>
<b>run:</b>
<pre>
desktop
</pre>
更多编译选项和运行参数，请参考doc下的文档。
